channel.title: [317] [GODWARS] [PVP ARMOUR]AcerX ~ Officially Released!
channel.description:
Basically I decidede to release this due to my computer rolling back after some incident with a virus. It had to be rolled back to this part :\ [size=24pt]AcerX[/size]
[size=36pt]DONATORS![/size] Confuzzled x] - $10 Donated.
Preset $1.00AUD Mobile Donation [URL=https://www.onebip.com/tinyurl/4c9691ee620ef5be45656498a3231578][IMG]http://www.onebip.com/tools/bts/btn06.gif[/img][/URL] Custom Ammount (Paypal) [URL=https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=6W5QH4B8G7MQ8&lc=AU&item_name=Donation%20For%20Server&currency_code=AUD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted][IMG]https://www.paypal.com/en_AU/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif[/img][/URL]
Okay. Well. I started developing this source a while ago. Theres no point in me using this. Its my first source. Base - Delta Credits Delta - Creating the base Me - Coding Moparscape.org - Tuts, Guides, Ect.
Here are some pictures I took : (THERES QUITE A BIT BTW ;) ALL PICTURES ARE BY ME!) soz for bad quality xD [img]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/531/agsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/1978/ancientsandlunar.jpg[/img] [img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/5606/assult.jpg[/img] [img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/135/barrowsh.jpg[/img] [img]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/43/bgsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/7503/dbowspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/9548/dragaxespec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/5417/explodeinjail.jpg[/img] [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/7689/fightpitsq.jpg[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/501/fixedmaster.jpg[/img] [img]http://img156.imageshack.us/img156/5949/funpk.jpg[/img] [img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/5033/newpanel.jpg[/img] [img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/4898/nolagwith200npcs.jpg[/img] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/1686/pestcontrol.jpg[/img] [img]http://img141.imageshack.us/img141/193/pietyworks.jpg[/img] [img]http://img227.imageshack.us/img227/4295/powdclaws.jpg[/img] [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/9669/sgsspec.jpg[/img] [img]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/658/skillcapesi.jpg[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/7918/vestasstatiuszuriels.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]FEATURES!!!!!![/size] - Customs. Such as Vestas, Statius ect. and Dragonlight with special attack! - New Custom Donator Area! Never seen before! - New Home. Im sick of gay old boring edgeville. - Good shops (Incl. Donator Shop That Accepts Paramya Tickets) - Edgeville is not home! - Jail! Added And Removed objects to look neater! Removed the mine 250 silver ores thing! And you cant use explosive potion in Jail! - FunPK! Duel Arena is FunPK But NPCS, Players, Explosive potions cant make you loose items! - Fight Pits - Barrows - Assult Minigame with working shop items - Can hold 250+ npcs in 1 small area without lagging a bit! Theres a pic of it but i couldn't vid :( Sorry :( - Full Godsword Stances Picture of it is located at the top - 4-Hit Dragon Claws Special Attack! Theres a picture of it - ::message instead of ::yell to stop spammers Ill add more later aswell! Theres much more features! Cool commands! Ill post them later :) [size=24pt]KNOWN GLITCHES/BUGS![/size] -Shark doesnt heal properly. -Ags shows a hitmark on you. Know any more? Post them! [size=14pt]Commands![/size] master mute ipmute banuser ipban message alert home donarzone (To make someone a donator look in the char file) rareweps (Godswords and Dragon Claws) suggest dparty dparty2 players modzone visitjail maxcash t2g500 <- Tokkul 2 Gold t2g1000 (ect) <- Tokkul 2 Gold jail unjail prank USERNAME (This is kinda funny if u wanna embarrass someone) givemod giveadmin giveowner demote afk back whitepower god godoff jump jumpoff shops object helpdesk help home char newitem lunar prayer tz food torags dharoks veracs guthans ahrims karils pkweps veng onpickup offpickup spec people update mypos worship pnpc unpc npc emote interface auto spawn alert changepassword players bootall kick npcrefresh gfx tele xteletome xteleto xteleall
Download link: http://uppit.com/6fg8fgnlg5zq/Server.rar <-- Source http://uppit.com/vkpr62lh37s1/Client.rar <-- Client Please Comment and Rate. .Kami/Mee0345/Mee/itzkn1f3z <------- xD (NOTE!!!!!!!! THE IP ARE STILL SOME RANDOM IP THAT DOESNT EXIST ANYMORE!!!!!!!! WE GOT SHUTDOWN BECAUSE OF SOME ISSUES WITH SOME PLAYERS)
